channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13947] HoS print wrong number for hash table size in map join scenario
item.description: In sparkHashTableSinkOperator, when flushToFile, before close output stream, it try to get the file length, and will get 0 for it, take hashTableSinkOperator for ref, it should get length after output stream closed
item.summary: HoS print wrong number for hash table size in map join scenario

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: patch-1: simple fix to close the file stream before getting file status since otherwise, the file length would be 0. Checked from the log that we are now getting the correct file size, but can't think of a test for that.

thanks for you interest on this hos issue.

long time no person working on this module, another big hos issue hive-15104, will you be interest?
Sure I will take a look at HIVE-15104 as well.
